column4: Traffic;Siem Reap:------ (Preliminary information) Authorities say that at 2pm on the new highway of Phnom Kulen
column5: there was a traffic accident involving a tourist bus. Many are reported wounded and have been taken to the hospital.------Update: 12 people (including 9 women and an 11 year old) were hospitalized for broken bones and head injuries. None are thought to be life-threatening. There were 28 people on board at the time of the crash.------ Driver Keo Makara
column7: from in Kandal Province is being questioned by police
column8: and the  2004 HYUNDAI COUNTY Phnom Penh 3E 6998 has been taken to the district traffic office.------ ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/462524
